title: Can't download league?
body:
I know this is sounds pretty stupid but recently my league wouldn't open, it would just have the logo pop up and then disappear after another popup appears saying that I can't connect to HTTP server or some firewall thing idk so as a result I just thought to uninstall the game and reinstall. 

I went onto the OCE page and pressed download game but after I click the download button on the resulting page [this page would appear](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/ShellInstaller/OC1/LeagueofLegends_OC1_Installer_9_15_2014.exe), basically I can't download the game because apparently the web page is not available.

I'm not sure if this is my laptop's problem or if it's the server or what not (as you can see I'm not an expert) I've checked some forum threads and none of them really have a solution for me ;-; I'm pretty sure the problem does not lie in my firewall. I asked my friend to download it just to verify if it was my problem but the same webpage popped up for her.
If there is anyway to fix this please feel free to say so. >

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=DarkArtist,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=a1hRX0O3,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-10T04:00:44.685+0000)
>
> I know this is sounds pretty stupid but recently my league wouldn't open, it would just have the logo pop up and then disappear after another popup appears saying that I can't connect to HTTP server or some firewall thing idk so as a result I just thought to uninstall the game and reinstall. 
> 
> I went onto the OCE page and pressed download game but after I click the download button on the resulting page [this page would appear](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/ShellInstaller/OC1/LeagueofLegends_OC1_Installer_9_15_2014.exe), basically I can't download the game because apparently the web page is not available.
> 
> I'm not sure if this is my laptop's problem or if it's the server or what not (as you can see I'm not an expert) I've checked some forum threads and none of them really have a solution for me ;-; I'm pretty sure the problem does not lie in my firewall. I asked my friend to download it just to verify if it was my problem but the same webpage popped up for her.
> If there is anyway to fix this please feel free to say so. >


U can try this:D
1. Right click on your connection icon in the bottom right of your screen.
2. Go to the network centre. 
3. Go to the adapter settings thing.
4. Search your connection.
5. Right click -> properties.
6. Search.
7. Right click -> properties.
8.﻿Change your DNS servers to 8.8.4.4 (the first one) and 8.8.8.8 (the second one)

windows 7
1.go to network and sharing centre
2. click on your active network 
3. Go to properties
4. find Internet protocol version 4
5. Change your DNS servers address to 8.8.4.4 (the first one) and 8.8.8.8 (the second one)

> [{quoted}](name=Jiligulu qulala,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=a1hRX0O3,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-10T11:08:44.362+0000)

> windows 7

> 2. click on your active network 
> 3. Go to properties
> 4. find Internet protocol version 4
> 5. Change your DNS servers address to 8.8.4.4 (the first one) and 8.8.8.8 (the second one)

This worked for me ^__^
I too am having the exact same problem and changing to google's public DNS (8.8.4.4/8.8.8.8) does not resolve things.

I clicked the link and it's working fine.

Who's your ISP?
I have the exact same problem, it started happening to me around 1-2 AM of 10th January. I can't even re-download it, because Chrome cannot display the webpage :/

Uninstall
Reinstall was my idea, but I can't download "LeagueofLegends_OC1_Installer_9_15_2014.exe" anymore. {{summoner:3}} 

If any1 figures something out, please let me know as well.
Cheers,
Hue i got the installer from friend on skype, he doesn't have 'Local Network' = 69 ILLUMINATI ALLOWS 42
